description.value:
> Envoy

At 3rd level and every 4 levels thereafter, you choose an expertise talent, which gives you an extra option when using a skill with which you have expertise. The list of expertise talents appears on pages 269â€“270.

Expertise Talents

Additional Skill Expertise (Ex)

Altered Bearing (Ex; Disguise)

Analyst (Ex; Sense Motive)

Cautious Expertise (Ex; see below)

Convincing Liar (Ex; Bluff)

Cultural Savant (Ex; Culture)

Cunning Disguise (Ex; Disguise)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.ap1WeVUtXKtSH9Xt]{Effortless Innuendo (Ex; Bluff)}

Engineering Adept (Ex; Engineering)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.im7htoCz9yJhexj3]{Expert Distraction (Ex; Bluff)}

Expert Forger (Ex; Computers)

Fast Hack (Ex; Computers)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.8fURuuBmBKCMphQp]{Gregarious Mien (Ex; Diplomacy)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.JwHTRdVO2uOVKID6]{Improvise Surgery (Ex; Medicine)}

Inspired Medic (Ex; Medicine)

Keen Observer (Ex; Sense Motive)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.baAR5ECreywAFOnt]{Maneuver Expertise (Ex; Combat Expertise)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.eRkaT4sePHSJoG2O]{Master of Disguise (Ex; Disguise)}

Menacing Gaze (Ex; Intimidate)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.f5PNjLPsmVwQC3YJ]{Miracle Worker (Ex; Medicine)}

Rattling Presence (Ex; Intimidate)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.C7bBiPO5wWMzth8W]{Saving Expertise (Ex; Special)}

Skilled Linguist (Ex; Culture)

Slick Customer (Ex; Diplomacy)

Student of Technology (Ex; Engineering)

Surgeon (Ex; Medicine)

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.JT12TIfVAk73Ryzx]{Universal Diplomat (Ex; Diplomacy)}

Well Informed (Ex; Diplomacy)
